verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w whole|strong="G0537"\w* \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w arose|strong="G0450"\w*, and \w led|strong="G0071"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w accuse|strong="G2723"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, We \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w this|strong="G5126"\w* \add fellow\add* \w perverting|strong="G1294"\w* the \w nation|strong="G1484"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w forbidding|strong="G2967"\w* to \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w tribute|strong="G5411"\w* to \w Cæsar|strong="G2541"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* that he \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w is|strong="G1511"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* a \w King|strong="G0935"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Art|strong="G1488"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* the \w King|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* and \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, \wj  \+w Thou|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w sayest|strong="G3004"\+w* \+add it\+add*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add to\add* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*, I \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w fault|strong="G0158"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they were the more \w fierce|strong="G2001"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, He stirreth \w up|strong="G0383"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w teaching|strong="G1321"\w* \w throughout|strong="G2596"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w Jewry|strong="G2449"\w*, \w beginning|strong="G0756"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w* \w to|strong="G2193"\w* this \w place|strong="G5602"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* of \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, he \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w whether|strong="G1487"\w* the \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w were|strong="G2076"\w* a \w Galilæan|strong="G1057"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* as soon as he \w knew|strong="G1921"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w belonged|strong="G2076"\w* \w unto|strong="G1537"\w* \w Herod’s|strong="G2264"\w* \w jurisdiction|strong="G1849"\w*, he \w sent|strong="G0375"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w*, who \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G5607"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w time|strong="G2250"\w*.

¶ And \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, he \w was|strong="G5463"\w* \w exceeding|strong="G3029"\w* \w glad|strong="G5463"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w desirous|strong="G2309"\w* to \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* a \w long|strong="G2425"\w* \add season\add*, \w because|strong="G1223"\w* he had \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* many \w things|strong="G4183"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w hoped|strong="G1679"\w* to have \w seen|strong="G1492"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w miracle|strong="G4592"\w* \w done|strong="G1096"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w questioned|strong="G1905"\w* with \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w many|strong="G2425"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* he \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w and|strong="G2723"\w* \w vehemently|strong="G2159"\w* \w accused|strong="G2723"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* men of \w war|strong="G4753"\w* \w set|strong="G1848"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* at \w nought|strong="G1848"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w mocked|strong="G1702"\w* \add him\add*, and \w arrayed|strong="G4016"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* in a \w gorgeous|strong="G2986"\w* \w robe|strong="G2066"\w*, and \w sent|strong="G0375"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w again|strong="G0375"\w* to \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w* were \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w friends|strong="G5384"\w* \w together|strong="G0240"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w before|strong="G4391"\w* they \w were|strong="G5607"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w enmity|strong="G2189"\w* \w between|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*, when he had called \w together|strong="G4779"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w rulers|strong="G0758"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*,

\w Said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, Ye have \w brought|strong="G4374"\w* \w this|strong="G5126"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* one that \w perverteth|strong="G0654"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w*, having \w examined|strong="G0350"\w* \add him\add* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, have \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w fault|strong="G0158"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* touching those things \w whereof|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w accuse|strong="G2723"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w No|strong="G0235"\w*, nor \w yet|strong="G3761"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I \w sent|strong="G0375"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w lo|strong="G2400"\w*, \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w* of \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w done|strong="G4238"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.
I \w will|strong="G3811"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w chastise|strong="G3811"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w release|strong="G0630"\w* \add him\add*.

(\w For|strong="G1161"\w* of \w necessity|strong="G0318"\w* he \w must|strong="G2192"\w* \w release|strong="G0630"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w at|strong="G2596"\w* the \w feast|strong="G1859"\w*.)

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they cried \w out|strong="G0349"\w* all at \w once|strong="G3826"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Away \w with|strong="G0142"\w* \w this|strong="G5126"\w* \add man\add*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w release|strong="G0630"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w Barabbas|strong="G0912"\w*:

(\w Who|strong="G3748"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w sedition|strong="G4714"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* for \w murder|strong="G5408"\w*, was \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w prison|strong="G5438"\w*.)

\w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w willing|strong="G2309"\w* to \w release|strong="G0630"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w spake|strong="G4377"\w* again to \w them|strong="G3825"\w*.
\w But|strong="G1161"\w* they \w cried|strong="G2019"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \add him\add*, \w crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* the third \w time|strong="G5154"\w*, \w Why|strong="G5101"\w*, \w what|strong="G1063"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w hath|strong="G4160"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w done|strong="G4160"\w*? I have \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w cause|strong="G0158"\w* of \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: I \w will|strong="G3811"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w chastise|strong="G3811"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w let|strong="G0630"\w* \add him\add* \w go|strong="G0630"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they were \w instant|strong="G1945"\w* with \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voices|strong="G5456"\w*, \w requiring|strong="G0154"\w* \w that|strong="G4717"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* might be \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w voices|strong="G5456"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w prevailed|strong="G2729"\w*.
\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* gave \w sentence|strong="G1948"\w* that it should \w be|strong="G1096"\w* as \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w required|strong="G0155"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w released|strong="G0630"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* him \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w sedition|strong="G4714"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w murder|strong="G5408"\w* was \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w prison|strong="G5438"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* they had \w desired|strong="G0154"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* he \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* to \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* they \w led|strong="G0520"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w away|strong="G0520"\w*, they laid hold \w upon|strong="G1949"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w*, a \w Cyrenian|strong="G2956"\w*, coming \w out|strong="G2064"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* the \w country|strong="G0068"\w*, \w and|strong="G2007"\w* on \w him|strong="G0846"\w* they \w laid|strong="G2007"\w* the \w cross|strong="G4716"\w*, that he might \w bear|strong="G5342"\w* \add it\add* \w after|strong="G3693"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* there \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w company|strong="G4128"\w* of \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w women|strong="G1135"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w bewailed|strong="G2875"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w lamented|strong="G2354"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w turning|strong="G4762"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Daughters|strong="G2364"\+w* \+w of Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\+w*, \+w weep|strong="G2799"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G4133"\+w* \+w weep|strong="G2799"\+w* \+w for yourselves|strong="G1438"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w children|strong="G5043"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G3754"\+w*, \+w behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w the days|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w are coming|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w they shall say|strong="G2046"\+w*, \+w Blessed|strong="G3107"\+w* \+add are\+add* \+w the barren|strong="G4723"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the wombs|strong="G2836"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w never|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w bare|strong="G1080"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the paps|strong="G3149"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w never|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w gave suck|strong="G2337"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Then|strong="G5119"\+w* \+w shall they begin|strong="G0756"\+w* \+w to say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w to the mountains|strong="G3735"\+w*, \+w Fall|strong="G4098"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w us|strong="G2248"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to the hills|strong="G1015"\+w*, \+w Cover|strong="G2572"\+w* \+w us|strong="G2248"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w they do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w these things|strong="G5023"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w a green|strong="G5200"\+w* \+w tree|strong="G3586"\+w*, \+w what|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w shall be done|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the dry|strong="G3584"\+w*?\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* there \w were|strong="G0071"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w other|strong="G2087"\w*, \w malefactors|strong="G2557"\w*, led \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to be put to \w death|strong="G0337"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* they were \w come|strong="G0565"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* the \w place|strong="G5117"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w Calvary|strong="G2898"\w*, \w there|strong="G1563"\w* they \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w malefactors|strong="G2557"\w*, \w one|strong="G3739"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* the right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* the \w other|strong="G3739"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* the \w left|strong="G0710"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \wj  \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*, \+w forgive|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w*; \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w they know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w what|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w they do|strong="G4160"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w parted|strong="G1266"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w raiment|strong="G2440"\w*, and \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w lots|strong="G2819"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w beholding|strong="G2334"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w rulers|strong="G0758"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w derided|strong="G1592"\w* \add him\add*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, He \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* \w others|strong="G0243"\w*; let him \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w be|strong="G2076"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, the \w chosen|strong="G1588"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w mocked|strong="G1702"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, coming \w to|strong="G4334"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* offering \w him|strong="G4374"\w* \w vinegar|strong="G3690"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w be|strong="G1488"\w* the \w king|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* a \w superscription|strong="G1923"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* in \w letters|strong="G1121"\w* of \w Greek|strong="G1673"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Latin|strong="G4513"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="G1444"\w*, \w THIS|strong="G3778"\w* \w IS|strong="G2076"\w* THE \w KING|strong="G0935"\w* OF THE \w JEWS|strong="G2453"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of the \w malefactors|strong="G2557"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* were \w hanged|strong="G2910"\w* \w railed|strong="G0987"\w* on \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w be|strong="G1488"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w other|strong="G2087"\w* \w answering|strong="G0611"\w* \w rebuked|strong="G2008"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Dost|strong="G5399"\w* \w not|strong="G3761"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w fear|strong="G5399"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w seeing|strong="G3754"\w* thou \w art|strong="G1488"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w condemnation|strong="G2917"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3303"\w* \w justly|strong="G1346"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* we \w receive|strong="G0618"\w* the due \w reward|strong="G0514"\w* of our \w deeds|strong="G4238"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* this \w man|strong="G3778"\w* hath \w done|strong="G4238"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w amiss|strong="G0824"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w remember|strong="G3415"\w* \w me|strong="G3450"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* thou \w comest|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1722"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto thee|strong="G4671"\+w*, \+w To day|strong="G4594"\+w* \+w shalt thou be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1700"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w paradise|strong="G3857"\+w*.\wj*
